1: %% @doc Unit tests for router_core:route/2 + Telemetry contract
    2: %% Verifies that telemetry:span/3 contract is correctly followed
    3: -module(router_core_telemetry_contract_SUITE).
    4: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
    5: %% Use local minimal test types to avoid include path issues
    6: -include("beamline_router_test_types.hrl").
    7: 
    8: -export([all/0, init_per_suite/1, end_per_suite/1, init_per_testcase/2, end_per_testcase/2]).
    9: -export([
   10:     test_route_returns_tuple_with_metadata/1,
   11:     test_route_telemetry_stop_event_no_exception/1,
   12:     test_route_error_returns_correct_format/1,
   13:     test_route_success_returns_correct_format/1
   14: ]).
   15: 
   16: all() ->
   17:     [
   18:         test_route_returns_tuple_with_metadata,
   19:         test_route_telemetry_stop_event_no_exception,
   20:         test_route_error_returns_correct_format,
   21:         test_route_success_returns_correct_format
   22:     ].
   23: 
   24: init_per_suite(Config) ->
   25:     _ = application:load(beamline_router),
   26:     ok = application:set_env(beamline_router, grpc_port, 0),
   27:     ok = application:set_env(beamline_router, grpc_enabled, false),
   28:     ok = application:set_env(beamline_router, nats_mode, mock),
   29:     case application:ensure_all_started(beamline_router) of
   30:         {ok, _} ->
   31:             timer:sleep(200),
   32:             Config;
   33:         Error ->
   34:             ct:fail("Failed to start beamline_router: ~p", [Error])
   35:     end.
   36: 
   37: end_per_suite(Config) ->
   38:     application:stop(beamline_router),
   39:     Config.
   40: 
   41: init_per_testcase(_TestCase, Config) ->
   42:     Config.
   43: 
   44: end_per_testcase(_TestCase, Config) ->
   45:     Config.
   46: 
   47: %% Test: route/2 returns {Result, StopMetadata} tuple
   48: test_route_returns_tuple_with_metadata(_Config) ->
   49:     %% Create valid route request
   50:     Message = #{
   51:         <<"message_id">> => <<"test-msg">>,
   52:         <<"tenant_id">> => <<"test_tenant">>,
   53:         <<"message_type">> => <<"chat">>,
   54:         <<"payload">> => <<"test">>
   55:     },
   56:     RouteRequest = #route_request{
   57:         message = Message,
   58:         policy_id = undefined,
   59:         context = #{}
   60:     },
   61:     
   62:     %% Create a test policy first
   63:     Policy = #policy{
   64:         tenant_id = <<"test_tenant">>,
   65:         policy_id = <<"default">>,
   66:         weights = #{<<"openai">> => 1.0}
   67:     },
   68:     {ok, _} = router_policy_store:upsert_policy(<<"test_tenant">>, Policy, undefined),
   69:     
   70:     %% Call route/2
   71:     %% Note: telemetry:span/3 returns only Result, not {Result, StopMetadata}
   72:     Result = router_core:route(RouteRequest, #{}),
   73:     
   74:     %% Verify it returns {ok, Decision} (telemetry:span/3 unwraps the tuple)
   75:     case Result of
   76:         {ok, #route_decision{}} ->
   77:             ok;
   78:         _ ->
   79:             ct:fail("Expected {ok, #route_decision{}}, got: ~p", [Result])
   80:     end,
   81:     
   82:     ok.
   83: 
   84: %% Test: Telemetry stop event doesn't throw exception
   85: test_route_telemetry_stop_event_no_exception(_Config) ->
   86:     %% Track telemetry events
   87:     Events = ets:new(telemetry_events, [set, private]),
   88:     HandlerId = {?MODULE, test_telemetry_contract},
   89:     
   90:     telemetry:attach(HandlerId, [router_core, route, stop],
   91:         fun(_Event, Measurements, Metadata, _) ->
   92:             ets:insert(Events, {stop, Measurements, Metadata})
   93:         end, #{}),
   94:     
   95:     telemetry:attach(HandlerId, [router_core, route, exception],
   96:         fun(_Event, Measurements, Metadata, _) ->
   97:             ets:insert(Events, {exception, Measurements, Metadata})
   98:         end, #{}),
   99:     
  100:     %% Create valid route request
  101:     Message = #{
  102:         <<"message_id">> => <<"test-msg">>,
  103:         <<"tenant_id">> => <<"test_tenant">>,
  104:         <<"message_type">> => <<"chat">>,
  105:         <<"payload">> => <<"test">>
  106:     },
  107:     RouteRequest = #route_request{
  108:         message = Message,
  109:         policy_id = undefined,
  110:         context = #{}
  111:     },
  112:     
  113:     %% Create a test policy first
  114:     Policy = #policy{
  115:         tenant_id = <<"test_tenant">>,
  116:         policy_id = <<"default">>,
  117:         weights = #{<<"openai">> => 1.0}
  118:     },
  119:     {ok, _} = router_policy_store:upsert_policy(<<"test_tenant">>, Policy, undefined),
  120:     
  121:     %% Call route/2 - should not throw exception
  122:     %% Note: telemetry:span/3 returns only Result, not {Result, StopMetadata}
  123:     try
  124:         Result = router_core:route(RouteRequest, #{}),
  125:         case Result of
  126:             {ok, #route_decision{}} ->
  127:                 ok;
  128:             _ ->
  129:                 ct:fail("Expected {ok, #route_decision{}}, got: ~p", [Result])
  130:         end,
  131:         
  132:         timer:sleep(200),  %% Allow telemetry to process
  133:         
  134:         %% Verify stop event was emitted (not exception)
  135:         case ets:lookup(Events, stop) of
  136:             [{stop, _Measurements, _Metadata}] ->
  137:                 ok;  %% Expected
  138:             [] ->
  139:                 ct:fail("Telemetry stop event was not emitted")
  140:         end,
  141:         
  142:         %% Verify no exception event
  143:         [] = ets:lookup(Events, exception),
  144:         
  145:         ok
  146:     catch
  147:         Class:Error:Stacktrace ->
  148:             telemetry:detach(HandlerId),
  149:             ets:delete(Events),
  150:             ct:fail("Exception thrown: ~p:~p~n~p", [Class, Error, Stacktrace])
  151:     end,
  152:     
  153:     telemetry:detach(HandlerId),
  154:     ets:delete(Events),
  155:     ok.
  156: 
  157: %% Test: Error case returns correct format
  158: test_route_error_returns_correct_format(_Config) ->
  159:     %% Create route request with missing tenant_id
  160:     Message = #{
  161:         <<"message_id">> => <<"test-msg">>
  162:         %% tenant_id missing
  163:     },
  164:     RouteRequest = #route_request{
  165:         message = Message,
  166:         policy_id = undefined,
  167:         context = #{}
  168:     },
  169:     
  170:     %% Call route/2
  171:     %% Note: telemetry:span/3 returns only Result, not {Result, StopMetadata}
  172:     Result = router_core:route(RouteRequest, #{}),
  173:     
  174:     %% Verify it returns {error, ...} (telemetry:span/3 unwraps the tuple)
  175:     case Result of
  176:         {error, {missing_tenant_id, _Context}} ->
  177:             ok;
  178:         _ ->
  179:             ct:fail("Expected {error, {missing_tenant_id, _Context}}, got: ~p", [Result])
  180:     end,
  181:     
  182:     ok.
  183: 
  184: %% Test: Success case returns correct format
  185: test_route_success_returns_correct_format(_Config) ->
  186:     %% Create valid route request
  187:     Message = #{
  188:         <<"message_id">> => <<"test-msg">>,
  189:         <<"tenant_id">> => <<"test_tenant">>,
  190:         <<"message_type">> => <<"chat">>,
  191:         <<"payload">> => <<"test">>
  192:     },
  193:     RouteRequest = #route_request{
  194:         message = Message,
  195:         policy_id = undefined,
  196:         context = #{}
  197:     },
  198:     
  199:     %% Create a test policy first
  200:     Policy = #policy{
  201:         tenant_id = <<"test_tenant">>,
  202:         policy_id = <<"default">>,
  203:         weights = #{<<"openai">> => 1.0}
  204:     },
  205:     {ok, _} = router_policy_store:upsert_policy(<<"test_tenant">>, Policy, undefined),
  206:     
  207:     %% Call route/2
  208:     %% Note: telemetry:span/3 returns only Result, not {Result, StopMetadata}
  209:     Result = router_core:route(RouteRequest, #{}),
  210:     
  211:     %% Verify it returns {ok, Decision} (telemetry:span/3 unwraps the tuple)
  212:     case Result of
  213:         {ok, Decision} when is_record(Decision, route_decision) ->
  214:             ok;
  215:         _ ->
  216:             ct:fail("Expected {ok, #route_decision{}}, got: ~p", [Result])
  217:     end,
  218:     
  219:     ok.
